items.title: A mite-y use of electricity

items.title: How simple prompts can make partially automated cars safer

items.title: Innovative one-minute video game boasts 80% success rate in diagnosing autism
items.description: A new one-minute video game is able to accurately and efficiently identify children with autism from those who have ADHD or are neurotypical.

items.title: Ocean-surface warming four times faster now than late-1980s
items.description: The study helps explain why 2023 and early 2024 saw unprecedented ocean temperatures.
